title: Water Treatment Chemicals Market Growth Outlook: CAGR of 6.67% and Value Reaching USD 72.46 Billion by 2032
description: Burlingame, CA, Dec. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Global Water Treatment Chemicals Market is estimated to be valued at USD 46.11 Bn in 2025 and is expected to reach USD 72.46 Bn in 2032, exhibiting a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 6.67% from 2025 t…
